SNIPER looks around and stands up. 
"Don't you idiots care about the future. If the autobots are killed 
all amximals will die but the preds will be weaker because they 
depended on the maximal/autobots throughout history."
SNIPER pulls out his gun and shoots at all the Preds he sees
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
CROW LORD answer why he is here by saying
"I want to join yall cause yall are the most powerful group right now"
